oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ANIPLAN: Planning for better animal health and welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Dairy cattle
Health and welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: It is a main goal for organic livestock farming that animals should always have excellent health and welfare. However, there are indications that this is not always guaranteed even though organic standards are being followed. On this background the ANIPLAN project aims at minimising medicine use in organic dairy herds through active and well-planned animal health and welfare promotion and disease prevention.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Project} ANIPLAN: ANIPLAN: Planning for better animal health and welfare. Runs 2007 - 2010. Project Leader(s): Vaarst, Mette, University of Aarhus.
